text: To assess change in attitudes related to LEANS, children completed a pre- and post-test about neurodiversity knowledge. 8 classes from 4 mainstream Scottish primary schools were involved in the project.

text:
The two concepts are:

Neurodiversity‚Äîthe idea that it's normal for people's brains to be different from each other and that's not bad in and of itself.

Neurotypicality (and not)‚ÄîThe state of having a brain that functions... typically. As expected. (Or not.)
